Explanation: Species level taxonomic differences between MDD version 1.0 and MDD version 2.0.
the full scientific name used in the previous MDD version separated by an underscore "_" (NA if the species is not included in that version)
the full scientific name used in the next MDD version separated by an underscore "_" (NA if the species is not included in that version)
comments related to the given change
the type of change made; this may be filled with a variety of categories, including 'split', 'lump', 'de novo', 'genus change', 'spelling change', 'added', 'removed'
any references used to justify the given change
